title: DE4A diploma
description: Schema for additional properties on credentialSubject to describe educational use case.

credentialSubject.description: Additional properties on credentialSubject to describe educational use cases

currentFamilyName.description: Family name of the person. Part of EIDAS minimal dataset.

currentGivenName.description: Given name of the person. Part of EIDAS minimal dataset.

dateOfBirth.description: Date of birth of the person. Part of EIDAS minimal dataset.

personIdentifier.description: Person identifier of the person. Part of EIDAS minimal dataset.

achieved.description: An achievement of the person. Association LearningAchievement

performed.description: A learning activity that a person participated in or attended. Association LearningActivity

entitledTo.description: The entitlement of the person. Association Entitlement

schemeID.description: Defines the schema used to define alternative identification

learningAchievement.description: The acquisition of knowledge, skills or responsibility and autonomy. A recognised and/or awarded set of learning outcomes of an individual.

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the learning achievement

identifier.description: An alternative identifier assigned to the achievement by the organisation awarding the achievement. Association to Identifier

definition.description: Includes a description of the achievement

additionalNote.description: Includes an additional free text note about the achievement.

wasDerivedFrom.description: An assessment which proves the acquisition of the learning outcomes which make up the achievement. Association Assessment

wasInfluencedBy.description: Activities which contributed to the acquisition of the learning outcomes which make up the achievement. Association Learning Activity

wasAwardedBy.description: The awarding details of this achievement. Association AwardingProcess

hasPart.description: Define smaller units of achievement, which when combined make up this achievement.

learningAchievements.description: Define smaller units of achievement, which when combined make up this achievement. Association learningAchievement

entitlesTo.description: Define Entitlements the owner has received as a result of this achievement. Association Entitlement

specifiedBy.description: Define What has been learned. Association LearningSpecification

associatedLearningOpportunity.description: Defines The learning opportunity that was taken to obtain the awarded LearningSpecification. Association LearningOpportunity (URI)

learningSpecification.description: Defines an opportunity to realise a given set of learning outcomes via a learning activity and/or assessment

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Accreditation

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the learning specification, as assigned to it by the organisation who designed the specification.

learningOpportunityType.description: Describes the type of learning opportunity

title.description: Defines the title of the learning specification

alternativeLabel.description: An alternative name of the learning specification

definition.description: Short and abstract description about the learning specification.

learningOutcomeDescription.description: The full learning outcome description of the learning specification

additionalNote.description: An additional free text note about the learning specification.

homePage.description: The homepage (a public web document) of the learning specification.

supplementaryDocument.description: A public web document containing additional documentation about the learning specification.

iSCEDFCode.description: Thematic Area according to the ISCED-F 2013 Classification.

educationSubject.description: An associated field of education from another semantic framework than the ISCED classification. Association EducationSubject  (URI)

volumeOfLearning.description: The estimated number of hours the learner is expected to spend engaged in learning to earn the award. This would include the notional number of hours in class, in group work, in practicals, as well as hours engaged in self-motivated study

eCTSCreditPoints.description: The credit points assigned to the learning specification, following the ECTS credit system

creditPoints.description: The credit points assigned to the learning specification, following an alternative educational credit system.

educationLevel.description: An associated level of education within a semantic framework describing education levels. Association EducationLevel (URI)

language.description: The instruction and/or assessment language(s) used

mode.description: Defines the mode of learning and or assessment

learningSetting.description: The type of learning setting (formal, non-formal).

maximumDuration.description: The maximum duration (in months) that a person may use to complete the learning opportunity.

targetGroup.description: A specific target group or category for which this specification is designed.

entryRequirementsNote.description: The maximum duration (in months) that a person may use to complete the learning opportunity.

learningOutcome.description: An individual (expected) learning outcome of the learning specification. Association to LearningOutcome

assessmentSpecification.description: Assessments a person can undergo to prove the acquisition of the learning outcomes. Association   AssessmentSpecification

entitlementSpecification.description: Rights (such as which the person may acquire as a result of acquiring the learning outcomes. Association   EntitlementSpecification

awardingOpportunity.description: Refers to an activity related to the awarding of the learning specification, such as the country or region where the qualification is awarded, the awarding body and optionally the awarding period now or in the past. Association    AwardingOpportunity

hasPart.description: A learning specification can be composed of other narrower learning specifications which when combined make up this learning specification. Association LearningSpecification

specialisationOf.description: A learning specification can be composed of other narrower learning specifications which when combined make up this learning specification. Association LearningSpecification

qualification.description: a specification of an assessment and validation process which is obtained when a competent authority determines that an individual has achieved learning outcomes to given standards.

isPartial Qualification.description: Indicates whether a qualification is a full qualification or part of another qualification

eqflLevel.description: The qualification level as specified by the European Qualification Framework.

nqflLevel.description: The qualification level as specified by a National Qualification Framework

hasAccreditation.description: The accreditation of a qualification. Association Accreditation (URI)

learningOutcome.description: Defines a statement regarding what a learner knows, understands and is able to do on completion of a learning process, which are defined in terms of knowledge, skills and responsibility and autonomy.

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the learning outcome

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the learning outcome, used by business logic. Association Identifier

name.description: Defines a legible, descriptive name for the learning outcome

definition.description: Defines a free text describing the learning outcome. A detailed learning outcome may include a description of what the student can do as a result of learning, with an indication of the level of achievement, and the conditions or context under which this can be performed (if applicable).

reusabilityLevel.description: Defines the reusability level for the learning outcome

relatedSkill.description: Includes a link to a related skill or the level of a related skill on a skill framework (except ESCO).

relatedECOSkill.description: Includes a link to an ESCO Skill

learningActivitySpecification.description: The specification of a process which leads to the acquisition of knowledge, skills or responsibility and autonomy.

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the learning activity specification

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the learning outcome, used by the organization defining the learning actitivty. Association Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the learning activity specification

alternativeLabel.description: Defines an alternative name of the activity specification

definition.description: Defines a free text description of the learning activity specification.

additionalNote.description: Defines an additional free text description of the learning activity specification.

homePage.description: Includes the Webpage describing the activity specification.

supplementaryDocument.description: Includes A public web document containing additional documentation about the learning activity specification.

learningActivityType.description: Defines the type of learning activity

workload.description: The expected workload indicated in the estimated number of hours the learner is expected to spend engaged in the activity. This would include the notional number of hours in class, in group work, in practicals, as well as hours engaged in self-motivated study

mode.description: Defines the mode of learning and or assessment

teaches.description: Defines the expected learning outcomes this learning activity specification can lead or contribute to. Association to LearningSpecification

hasPart.description: A learning activity specification can be composed of smaller learning specifications, which when combined make up this learning specification. Association LearningActivitySpecification

specialisationOf.description: An activity specification (e.g. a standard) of which this specification is a specialisation. Association LearningActivitySpecification

learningActivity.description: Defines any process which leads to the acquisition of knowledge, skills or responsibility and autonomy.

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the learning activity

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the learning activity assigned to the assessment by the organisation directing the activity. Association Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the learning activity.

definition.description: Defines a free text description of the learning activity

additionalNote.description: Defines more information using a additional free text note about the activity

workload.description: Defines the actual workload in number of hours the learner has spent engaged in the activity. This would include the number of hours in class, in group work, in practicals, as well as hours engaged in self-motivated study. Workload in Hours

startedAtTime.description: Defines the date the learner started the activity

endedAtTime.description: Defines the  date the learner ended the activity

directedBy.description: Defines the DID of the organisation, or part of an organisation such as department, faculty, which directed the learning activity

location.description: Defines the  location where the activity took place. Association to Location

specifiedBy.description: Defines the  specification of this learning activity. Association to LearningActivitySpecification

usedLearningOpportunity.description: Defines when is used or taken opportunity to do this learning activity. Association to LearningOpportunity (URI)

influenced.description: Defines how performing this activity contributed to the acquisition of these related learning achievements. Association to Achievement (URI)

hasPart.description: Defines those smaller units of activity, which when combined make up this activity. Association LearningActivity

assessmentSpecification.description: An Assessment Specification is a specification of a process establishing the extent to which a learner has attained particular knowledge, skills and competences against criteria such as learning outcomes or standards of competence.

id.description: Defines A portable and Unique Identifier of the Assessment Specification

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the assessment specification, as assigned to it by the organisation who designed the specification. Association Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the assessment specification

alternativeLabel.description: Defines an alternative name of the assessment specification

definition.description: Defines free text description of the assessment specification

additionalNote.description: Defines an additional free text note about the assessment specification.

homePage.description: Defines the homepage (a public web document) describing the details of the assessment specification

supplementaryDocument.description: Defines the urls for public web document containing additional documentation about the assessment specification

language.description: Defines the  language(s) of assessment used

mode.description: Defines mode of learning and or assessment

gradingscheme.description: A description of the specification of which learning outcomes are or have been proven. Association to ScoringScheme/GradingScheme

proves.description: Demostrates The learning achievement (and related learning outcomes) this assessment is designed to test. Association to LearningSpecification

hasPart.description: Defines Assessment Sub-Specifications.A assessment specification can be composed of other narrower assessment specifications which when combined make up this assessment specification. Association to AssessmentSpecification

specialisationOf.description: Defines An assessment specification (e.g. a standard) of which this specification is a specialisation. Association to AssessmentSpecification

assessment.description: The result of a process establishing the extent to which a learner has attained particular knowledge, skills and competences against criteria such as learning outcomes or standards of competence.

id.description: Defines a unique and portable identifier of the assessment.

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier assigned to the assessment by the organisation grading the assessment. Association to Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the assessment.

definition.description: Includes the description of the assessment

additionalNote.description: Defines an additional free text note about the assessment

grade.description: Defines a resulting grade of the assessment

shortenedGrading.description: Defines Indicator of how well the student was graded when compared to other students. Association to ShortenedGrading

resultDistribution.description: Describes a histogram of results achieved by all the students of a particular learning assessment. Association to ResultDistribution

issuedDate.description: Defines the Assessment Date: when the grade was awarded

idVerification.description: Defines the method of assessment supervision and id verification

assessedBy.description: Defines competent body that awarded the grade. Association Agent (URI)

specifiedBy.description: The specification of this assessment. Association AssessmentSpecification

hasPart.description: Defines Sub-Assessments; Smaller assessments, which when combined make up and can influence this assessment. Association Assessment

shortenedGrading.description: Indicator of how well the student was graded when compared to other students

percentageLower.description: The percentage of students of the same course who got a lower grade.

percentageEqual.description: DThe percentage of students of the same course who got exactly the same grade.

percentageHigher.description: The percentage of students of the same course who got a higher grade.

resultDistribution.description: Description of a single score or score range within a histogram of results

category.description: Describes a single range within the histogram. Association resultCategory

definition.description: Includes a free text description of the histogram

resultCategory.description: Description of a single score or score range within a histogram of results

label.description: Defines the label of the histogram score or score range. Should correspond to the grading scheme which have been used. E.g. 'C', or '20-30'

gradingScheme.description: Defines a set of criteria that measures varying levels of achievement.

id.description: Defines a portable and unique identifier of the Grading Scheme

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the Grading Scheme assigned to it by the organisation administering the scheme. Association to Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the scoring scheme.

definition.description: Includes a free text describing the scoring scheme

supplementaryDocument.description: Includes public web document containing additional documentation about the scoring system

qualificationAwarded.description: A formal outcome of an assessment and validation process which is obtained when a competent authority determines that an individual has achieved learning outcomes to given standards.

specifiedBy.description: Defines the details of the awarded qualification. Association to Qualification

awardingProcess.description: The process of an organisation awarding Learning Achievement to person based on a Learning Specification (e.g. a qualification). It is used to specify the organisation that awarded the LearningSpecification to the individual, the country or region where the LearningSpecification was awarded, and optionally the date of awarding.

id.description: A portable and Unique Identifier of the Awarding Process

identifier.description: An alternative identifier of the awarding process defined by the organization. Association to Identifier

definition.description: A description of the awarding process to the individual

additionalNote.description: An additional free text note (e.g. a comment, a remark, etc.)

used.description: Defines the assessment that provided the basis for this awarding. Association to Assessment

learningAchievement.description: Defines the resulting learning achievement. Association to LearningAchievement

awardingBody.description: The DID of the awarding body that awarded the Achievement to the individual. Only in cases of co-awarding/co-graduation, where a qualification award is issued to an individual by two or more organisations the cardinality is greater than 1

awardingLocation.description: The location where the awarding activity took place (country/region where the qualification was awarded). Association Location (URI)

awardingOpportunity.description: An awarding activity represents an activity related to the awarding of a LearningSpecification. It is used to specify the country or region where the LearningSpecification is awarded, the awarding body and optionally the awarding period now or in the past.

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Accreditation

identifier.description: An alternative identifier of the awarding opportunity. Association to Identifier

awardingBody.description: The DID of the awarding body related to this awarding activity (i.e the organisation that issues the qualification) Only in cases of co-awarding/co-graduation, where a qualification is issued to an individual by two or more organisations the cardinality is greater than 1

location.description: Location where the awarding activity takes place (country/region where the qualification is awarded).

startedAtTime.description: The date since when the awarding activities take place. If not specified it is undefined (“not known”)

endedAtTime.description: The date until when the awarding activities take/took place

entitlement.description: Defines a right, e.g. to practice a profession, take advantage of a learning opportunity or join an organisation, as a result of the acquisition of knowledge, skills, responsibility and/or autonomy

id.description: Defines unique identifier of the Verifiable Accreditation

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the entitlement. Association to Identifier

title.description: Defines the title of the entitlement.

definition.description: Includes a free text description of the specific rights the holder of the credential has acquired

issuedDate.description: The date from which the entitlement was conferred

expiryDate.description: The date until which the entitlement was conferred

additionalNote.description: An additional free text note about the entitlement

specifiedBy.description: Defines a learning achievement which gave rise to the entitlement. Association EntitlementSpecification

wasDerivedFrom.description: Defines the learning achievement (and related learning outcomes) which gave rise to this entitlement. Association LearningAchievement

hasPart.description: Defines the learning achievement (and related learning outcomes) which gave rise to this entitlement. Association Entitlement

id.description: Defines A portable and unique identifier of the entitlement specification

identifier.description: Defines an alternative identifier of the entitlement specification. Association to Identifier

title.description: The title of the entitlement specification

alternativeLabel.description: Defines An alternative name of the entitlement specification

definition.description: A free text description of the entitlement specification

additionalNote.description: An additional free text note about entitlement specification.

homePage.description: The homepage (a public web document) of the entitlement specification.

supplementaryDocument.description: Defines a public web document containing additional documentation about the entitlement specification

entitlementType.description: A credential-holder may be entitled to membership of an organisation or professional association; to access a learning opportunity; or to perform a specific employment

status.description: A credential-holder may be entitled to membership of an organisation or professional association; to access a learning opportunity; or to perform a specific employment

limitOrganisation.description: Defines the DID of the organisation which acknowledges the entitlement (i.e. the organisation offering the learning opportunity, membership or employment opportunity).

limitJurisdiction.description: Defines the jurisdiction for which the entitlement is valid (the region or country).

limitOccupation.description: Defines a related Occupation: The An ESCO Occupation or Occupational class which the individual may access through the entitlement. Association EscoOccupationAssociation (URI)

limitNationalOccupation.description: Defines a An Occupation or Occupational Category. Association OccupationAssociation (URI)

mayResultFrom.description: Defines the learning specification may influence the Entitlement specification. Association LearningSpecification

hasPart.description: Defines smaller entitlement specifications, which when combined make up this entitlement specification. Association EntitlementSpecification

specializationOf.description: Defines An entitlement specification (e.g. a standard) of which this specification is a specialization. Association EntitlementSpecification
